uncertainties: Risk is strongly exposure-dependent (overdose/repeated high exposure vs typical exposure); without exposure context, risk_score reflects intrinsic overdose liability rather than routine-use risk.
Minor immune/inflammatory signaling can amplify injury after initial hepatocyte stress, but primary initiating events are metabolic/mitochondrial rather than classic adaptive immune hypersensitivity.
Mechanistic weights reflect population-level evidence; individual susceptibility varies with metabolic capacity and hepatic antioxidant reserve.
